user.description:
Provide your credentials and the domain used to access your login page via web.

For instance, if you access to `https://connect.elmospa.com/vendor/`, you must set the domain to `vendor`. In case you don't have a vendor defined, set it to `default`.

You can configure the system selecting "Options" after installing the integration.
